newsitem.title: USA: Sextant Avionique acquires Triumph unit.
newsitem.headline: Sextant Avionique acquires Triumph unit.

text.p: Triumph Group Inc said Thursday that the U.S. subsidiary of Sextant Avionique has agreed to acquire its Air Lab division, located in Seattle, for an undisclosed amount of cash.

As part of the agreement, Triumph said its A. Biederman aircraft instrument division has entered into a five-year contract to serve as an authorized repair station for select Sextant Avionique products, and to stock and distribute Sextant Avionique spare parts.
Air Lab repairs and overhauls aviation instrumentation and controls.
Sextant Avionique is a worldwide aviation system and equipment manufacturer, with $1.1 billion in annual sales.
Triumph Group designs, engineers, manufactures, repairs and overhauls aircraft components. It has $250 million in annual sales.
